title: Albarang
subtitle: Employer management service
description: Albarang provides worktime schedule management, attendance checker, and business intelligence. I was responsible for chatting system and business intelligence. implemented business intelligence with several charts.

title: Developers
subtitle: Job board for IT engineers
description: Developers is specialist job search/hunting web application benchmarketing wantedlab, Inc. I took a big part in implementing main-page design/UI, signup, search/filtering workers and offering inerview and advertisement system.

title: NChat
subtitle: Chatting Server and Clients with Netty
description: Nchat is a chatting server built with the help of powerful network framework Netty. The server and clients communicate with binary format using TCP/IP protocol. It is an asynchronous under event-driven architecture.

title: KakaoGateway
subtitle: Gateway server admin page
description: kakaoGateway admin page is a backoffice system to control the server which deals with more than hundred thousands of data per day, I served a role as implementing admin dashboard page providing real-time/non-real-time data anysistic chart.
